name: Matlab To Octave Converter
body:
### Welcome to Matlab To Octave Converter.
Hello Everyone. Thanks for taking time to visit my simple project matlab2octave. I program a lot in a different languages. One of it is matlab. Octave is a free software that is almost compatible with matlab. You need some syntax modifications to make the matlab code work in octave. For people who cannot afford a matlab license, Octave is their best bet. Instead of manually changing the syntax of your matlab file to make it octave compatible, this project achieves it automatically.

This is a very simple project with not more than 1000 lines of code combined. This is also my first open source project that I actually used. 

### Documentation
Please read the documentation for this project at https://github.com/adhithyan15/matlab2octave/wiki/Documentation to learn more about how to use this project for your purpose. 

### Authors and Contributors
This project was completely written from scratch by me(@adhithyan15). I am sophomore in college who is really interested in open source technologies. Visit my other ongoing projects at https://github.com/adhithyan15/. You can also email me at adhithyan15 at gmail dotcom. 

### Support or Contact
If you need any help read the documentation or email me at adhithyan15 at gmail dotcom.
tagline: A converter for transforming matlab files into octave compatible files
